resources.string: This app provides features to change text of most of the TextView in native Android app. Just click any text in an app and enter new text, then apply, every thing will be done.

Caution: This software is completely free and open-source, and only for learning usage. Please download this software from my Github page, or compile source code by yourself. Avoid using source-unknown packages.
You can only change those texts which can be highlighted(Exceptions may be exist).

If you highlight text in a page(we call it Activity) and then cancel the highlight, the text color won\'t restore to the origin color, since I don\'t store every original color of text. So it needs you to restart the application page.
This App cannot 100% hook text content, And it can only change text content in native Android App(e.g. Flutter/Web page is not supported).
